description: Completed a comprehensive program focused on full stack development and cloud technologies using .NET. Developed skills in frontend and backend development, cloud services, and DevOps practices.

Earned a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from the University of Westminster. Explored programming languages, software design, and project management. Completed projects including a capstone focused on scalable web applications.
Obtained a Diploma in Information Technology from the Informatics Institute of Technology (IIT) within the academic year spanning from September 2011 to May 2012.
